/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly green, blue, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both vibrant and serene.
